segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a nice contrast to the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the path and the low bushes, everything looks so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window is wide open, letting in lots of light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame the woman can't see the beauty outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's too busy drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are too focused on the cookies to notice the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish they could all take a moment to enjoy the view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a lovely day outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks like a perfect place to relax and forget about the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
